headline.print_headline: At Ailing Brooklyn Hospital, Insider Deals and Lavish Perks
headline.main: At Ailing Brooklyn Hospital, Insider Deals and Lavish Perks
headline.seo: At Ailing Wyckoff Hospital, Insider Deals and Lavish Perks

abstract: Three-month investigation into Wyckoff Heights Medical Center in Brooklyn offers a sobering portrait of how it, as a nonprofit hospital, has been undermined by the very people entrusted to run it; facility has been so troubled for so long that even the most accomplished leadership might have been unable to turn it around; but its recent difficulties, which are attracting the notice of the authorities, have clearly been deepened by management turmoil.
